Detailed Description

Basic exception class.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ting::Exc::Exc ( const char *  message = 0  )  [inline]

Exception constructor.

Parameters:
message - Pointer to the exception message null-terminated string. Constructor will copy the string into objects internal memory buffer. It is legal to supply 0.
virtual ting::Exc::~Exc (  )  throw () [inline, virtual]

Member Function Documentation

const char* ting::Exc::What (  )  const [inline]

Returns a pointer to exception message.

Returns:
a pointer to objects internal memory buffer holding the exception message null-terminated string. Note, that after the exception object is destroyed the pointer returned by this method become invalid.
